report.title: Relaxing and Clarifying
report.author: Manaca
report.bodytext: 5/21/01 /n /n /n I chew the leaves of this shrub quite regularly. It is relaxing and quite clarifying. /n /n I found that more is not really better or different. It seems to be about the same experience no matter how much I chew. I hold the chewed mass in my mouth to maximize sublingual input. /n /n It is said that the Secuoya of Ecuador employ it as an hallucinigen. /n They must be cooking it on down.
